{{zh-forms|s=处|alt=処}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|虍|処|c1=p|ls=psc}}.

===Etymology===
In {{zh-ref|Starostin}}, this is reconstructed as ''*thaʔ'' in Old Chinese and subsumed under {{cog|sit-pro||*dhăH (/*thăH)|to put; to place}}, whence also {{och-l|署|to place; to position}}, {{cog|bo|གདའ||to be; to be there}}, {{m|bo|གདན||seat; residence}} and {{cog|my|ထား||to put; to place}}.

With the original ''*–l–'' initial, compare Proto-[[Tamangic]] ''*ᴮglaː/ᴬglaː'' (“place”), {{cog|lus|tla}}, {{m|lus|tlat||to be; to exist; to live; to remain}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).

{{och-l|居}} may be related ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).
